nodes.text: Rallcema Bylissura was a female Human Jedi Knight serving the Jedi Order during the final years of the Republic Classic era. Like many Jedi of the era, Bylissura took up the rank of General during the Clone Wars. She was killed during the Battle of Jabiim by the Separatist Droid Army.
A Force-sensitive female Human, Rallcema Bylissura was trained by the Jedi Order in the ways of the Force. Over time, Bylissura attained the rank of Jedi Knight.

When the Clone Wars erupted across the galaxy, Bylissura accepted her role as a General in the Grand Army of the Republic to counter the droid army of the Confederacy of Independent Systems. During the war, Bylissura was assigned to assist in the massive defense of Jabiim. During the fighting, Bylissura was stationed at Shelter Base with fellow Jedi Dalnus Cam and Sana-Jis Ilowa. The Separatists ambushed the Jedi there and Bylissura was killed in the fighting.

It is possible Bylissura was the female Human Jedi who, while using the Force in an attempt to free a Republic walker stuck in the mud, was stabbed in the back with a sword by Alto Stratus, but that may have also been Sana-Jis Ilowa. Alternately, either Ilowa or Bylissura may have been the female Human Jedi who incorrectly reported all clear at Shelter Base just before the Separatist attack.
